subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Until he was 14, Giants defensive end Damontre Moore had lived most of his life in a  rough-edged Dallas neighborhood. Then his mother boldly moved the family to a leafy suburb.
snippet: Until he was 14, Giants defensive end Damontre Moore had lived most of his life in a  rough-edged Dallas neighborhood. Then his mother boldly moved the family to a leafy suburb.
